data.subtitle: Preguntas frequentes
data.description: Everything you need to know about the product and billing. Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

items.title: Is there a free trial available?
items.description: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

items.title: Can I change my plan later?
items.description: Of course. Our pricing scales with your company. Chat to our friendly team to find a solution that works for you.

items.title: What is your cancellation policy?
items.description: We understand that things change. You can cancel your plan at any time and we’ll refund you the difference already paid.

items.title: Can other info be added to an invoice?
items.description: Yes, you can try us for free for 30 days. If you want, we’ll provide you with a free, personalized 30-minute onboarding call to get you up and running as soon as possible.

items.title: How does billing work?
items.description: Plans are per workspace, not per account. You can upgrade one workspace, and still have any number of free workspaces.

items.title: How do I change my account email?
items.description: You can change the email address associated with your account by going to untitled.com/account from a laptop or desktop.
